turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to order a drink from Starbucks, please. Can you help me out?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure thing, what would you like to get?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get a Is there a caramel cloud macchiato?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Bless you and yes there is.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you. I'd like to order a caramel cloud macchiato grande with 2% milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and where are you picking up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: South Nellis Boulevard, Las Vegas, Nevada.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: any syrups or add ons Like whipped cream?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's a grande 2% caramel cloud macchiato with whipped cream and a dash of cinnamon on top from the starbucks on South Nells BLVD.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your drink is all set and will be ready for pickup in 15 minutes, the reciept will arrive via mobile.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: no problem, have a great day.
